name: ZEALOT
description:
You have been summoned by your Masters to perform the final ritual atop the Eternal Peak. Survive hordes from the space between the stars, using your reflexes and shooting skills until the Ritual is complete. Do not fail your Masters.

An Endless FPS Roguelike inspired by games such as Doom, Quake and Devils Daggers.

Created for 7DRL.

I actually didn't spend 7 days on this. While I would have liked to, I just didn't have the time. I spent more along the lines of 3 days.

Controls :

WASD to Move

Left Click to Shoot

Space to Jump
